reviews_data.review_text: Wonderful spot with great coffee and super friendly staff and ownership! Lots of space inside and outside in the courtyard for studying, work, or hanging out. Haervest Coffee roasters next door that supplies the coffee is a really cool spot if you get a chance to ask about it!  Oh, and try the sourdough waffle while you're there!! üßáüòç

My husband and I love backdrop! I love the lattes and he's a huge fan of the cold brew. All the food we've had has been fantastic, especially the sourdough waffle and avocado toast. The atmosphere is great and the staff is so friendly. Great addition to our neighborhood!!
Amazing space and delicious coffee and food! I enjoy the almond butter toast and my favorite drink so far is the iced cinnamon and honey latte! Always a great experience here. ü§ç
Incredible coffee with a friendly staff. The space is huge so it's easy to find a place to post up with your laptop.

While looking for batchhouse bakery, I stumbled upon Backdrop Coffee and y'all I couldn't be happier. Not only are the staff and owners nice the food and coffee is insanely good. I ordered the sourdough waffles with bananas, housemade flavored whip cream and honey but will be back for the avocado toast..  While here, i experienced my first coffee batching (coffee tasting) and never realized how freshly roasted and ground beans could taste different depending upon the region.  if you are looking for a great locally owned coffee shop and want to expand your knowledge of coffee I'd highly suggest Backdrop Coffee] because they have a passion for coffee and it shows.  5 out of 5 from me... I had such a great experience here.

If there was more stars to give, I would.  This place is exceptional in every way.  Location, decor, coffee, staff... and the owner Toby is one of the nicest, most friendly, genuine and knowledgable owners of a business I have ever witnessed.  He knows his stuff!  Goes out of his way to walk around, introduce himself to people and ask about them. He gives tours of his shop/facility and just exudes positive, friendly vibes every time I have been there!  Best "coffee shop" I have been in hands down (and I have been in MANY).
Love the atmosphere! Love the people! Coffee & Friends are here!

Great coffee shop!! The team was attentive and friendly. Great place to meet up or get some work done on the computer. Coffee was great, and they've done a great job distinguishing themselves apart from the competition in the area. Highly recommend!

I can't say enough about this place. I love the atmosphere. Friendly staff. The owner shared his story with me and I think it's great that his brother with autism inspired him ‚ô°. I hate when I'm not able to swing by and grab my honey cinnamon latte.
The best nitro cold brew in Charlotte! The service is top notch as well!

Vibes were good, coffee was great, food was delicious, but the kindness and hospitality of the workers are what make this 10/10. Had waffles (sourdough and pumpkin cream) and maple sugar lattes. I can't wait to come back!!!

Absolutely love this place. The atmosphere is modern and clean, but cozy and comfortable too. I'm not sure if he was the owner, but there was a man around who greeted just about every customer who came in, and even came to check on us that everything was good. The pumpkin spice latte was great and I liked the pumpkin cream cheese bagel, nothing was too sweet or overpowering. Will definitely be back to work from here!
Best coffee house in Charlotte! Great coffee, great food and the people/service are fantastic! Must have one of the sourdough waffles!
Great place. Got a tour from the founder Toby and it was awesome!

Langdon my barista knew his stuff. Nitro ($5) was delicious! Even had a coffee cube in it so as to not water down the drink.  VERY pleasant environment to work in from the variety of comfy seatings to the light classical music.
My favorite coffee ever!!
I absolutely adore this spot! Outstanding customer service, great coffee & the interior design isn't to be missed!
Best coffee shop in Charlotte! Langdon is the most genuine human working here and always brightens my day. 10/10 would recommend
Incredible place with a great mission.  Everyone was so friendly and took the time to show us the roasting and art throughout the facility.  Definitely check it out
I was so impressed with this wonderful treasure. I loved the coffee and the vibe. Toby gave us the tour and I came home with coffee packaged by Reid. ‚ò∫Ô∏è
It üêù awesome here!
The most loving and creative coffee roasters!
Great place, great people! Ask for the tour when you're there :)

This place is more than a coffee shop - it's a hub for the community. The owners are focused on making a difference in the world and are dedicated to inclusive spaces for those who are differently-abled (many of their employees have disabilities and do everything from roasting to making the artwork). They provide a sensory coffee tasting experience, complete with lights, sounds, and tactile objects. I've never seen anything like it. Positivity radiates through the place - not to mention the coffee and treats are delicious on top of everything else. This is a MUST visit!

Absolutely delicious coffee and super cute atmosphere. The owner here was incredibly kind and made the whole thing an experience. He took time to tell us about the heart behind the coffeeshop. A must-visit for coffee lovers.
This coffee house is open for business. The coffee is exceptional, and the baristas are friendly. It's a great place to go, take your laptop, or a good book and unwind!
Loved Backdrop Coffee in Charlotte NC. Such an amazing space and friendly staff and the cold brew was fantastic. Can't wait to go back!

A great spot that has several amazing features, including roasting on-site and a roasting lab that shows and tells you about the roasts of coffee based on colors and sounds! And check out the coloring pad operated by a robot! And of course the cold brew is delightful. Toby is a genuine guy devoted to all things coffee for over 30 years!
Much prefer Enderly coffee or not just coffee in this area. I think this coffee place is affiliated with the Elevation church, so beware if you go in and they ask if you want a tour
Looks like a brand new place. Big open space but keeps the cozy vibe. Love it
Thank you for recommending The 50/50 Frappe! It was amazing!!
Love this place! Coffee is amazing, owner and staff are all very friendly and personable. Backdrop Coffee is a wonderful addition to the area. I wish them many successful years here.

A great addition to Charlotte!  Positive music greets you in the parking lot, positive people greet you inside.  Oh ya, and they roast their own coffee beans, have plenty of space to spread out to work aaand being across from the Batchmaker certainly doesn't hurt.  I live 25 min away and Backdrop is well worth the drive!  Enjoy.

New favorite coffeehouse.  The staff are incredibly personable and kind. Ask the owner for a tour of the in-house production process.  The coffee was wonderful.  Creative touches dominate the interior space, with ample space inside to spend time and get some work done, and there's plenty of parking.  There's also a great outdoor patio nearing completion which has great views of uptown.  The Batchmaker bakery is just across the patio.  An all-around solid spot!
Delicious coffee and friendly people.

Wow! I was blown away at every part of Backdrop. My oatmilk latte was perfection, the atmosphere was serene and calming and I got a tour of the entire facility from Luke and Jazz. They roast, pack and ship their beans right from the Berryhill location. This is a must stop if you're in the area!

Fantastic new coffee shop!  The owners are amazing and the coffee is delicious.  I was especially excited that they had a flat white. The energy in the shop is wonderful and they work hard to be inclusive in their hiring process at every level.  The story behind all of their artwork is lovely and I recommend asking about it while you're there.  Everything from paintings to the art on their coffee beans to the rugs in the shop have a story.  My roommate and I were lucky enough to get a tour and all I can say is that we will definitely be back often.  It's a truly wonderful place and I'm excited about seeing it in all its glory when it has a public grand opening.  OH and the event space in the back!  It has a pretty fantastic view and has so much space that if you're looking for an awesome space to rent for a venue I highly recommend contacting the owners of Backdrop!
Great venue, with tasty coffee, friendliest staff, responsible ownership, and an energetic vibe with the roasting happening on right side of the space & community happening on the other. Fun!
